title-group.article-title: The Real Thing: A Dynamic Profile of The Term Structure of Real Interest Rates and Inflation Expectations in The United Kingdom, 1982-89

abstract.p: This article estimates real interest rates and inflation expectations from market-observable data without assuming anything about the form of agents' expectation-formation mechanism. By examining prices of index-linked and conventional gilt-edged securities from the U.K. bond market, real interest rates and inflation expectations are computed quarterly beginning 1982:2 for up to 14 maturities ranging from 1988 to 2024.
